title: [Self-Directed] LMS-Based Learning Analytics for Monitoring Mathematics Learning Progress

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics concepts and basic LMS (Learning Management System) usage
context.additional_context: Analytically tracking the process of solving mathematical problems in a VR simulation environment integrated with a Learning Management System (LMS)

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose individual student progress status with over 80% accuracy by analyzing learning data.
Learning Management System (LMS) analytics tools can identify students with low engagement within 48 hours
Customized learning feedback reports can be generated based on learning pattern data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
